chemistry:
- Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' items usin' chemical mixtures.
 - Increases effectiveness o' consumin' chemical compounds.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' items usin' chemical mixtures.
anatomy:
- Increases accuracy o' creature health, resistance, and vulnerability descriptions.
 - Decreases chance o' bleedin', poisonin', and burnin' pain from creatures.
 - Increases accuracy o' status effect tooltip descriptions.
 - Increases effectiveness o' healin' consumables.
 - Increases success chance when healin'.
 - Decreases chance o' bleedin' when usin' bare hands durin' combat or gatherin'.
 - Increases th' amount o' resources butchered at a time.
 - Increases effectiveness o' eatin' raw meat.
marksmanship: - Increases attack damage, accuracy, and maximum range when usin' bows and firearms.
blacksmithing:
- Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' items usin' metal.
 - Increased chance o' successfully repairin', reinforcin', and refinin' metal items.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' items usin' metal.
botany:
- Decreases chance o' tramplin' plants when steppin' on them.
 - Increases chance o' gatherin'/harvestin' resources on plants.
 - Increases th' quality o' resources gathered/harvested from trees and plants.
 - Decreases chance o' stamina reduction while gatherin'/harvestin' from plants.
 - Decreases chance o' damagin' th' plant when harvestin' or gatherin' from it.
 - Decreases seed germination time.
 - Increases th' amount o' resources gathered/harvested at a time.
 - Increases effectiveness o' eatin' plant-based consumables.
 - Increased chance o' successfully preservin', and refinin' plant-based items.
camping:
- Increases th' amount o' turns slept when usin' a bedroll.
 - Increases chance o' startin' a fire.
 - Increases th' accuracy o' tellin' th' time with a sundial.
 - Increases th' effectiveness o' extinguishin' open fires with th' smother action.
 - Increases chance t' successfully add fuel t' a torch.
cartography:
- Increases th' range in which ye can dig or cast t' gather booty from.
 - Increases clarity o' tattered and drawn maps, allowin' ye t' make out finer details even when th' maps be damaged or inaccurate.
 - Increases th' success rate o' copyin' and drawin' maps.
 - Increases th' accuracy o' drawin' yer surroundings.
 - Increases th' accuracy o' copyin' tattered or drawn maps.
 - Increases th' size/radius o' drawn maps.
 - At mid-tier skill level, reveals which islands yer tresure maps reside on.
claythrowing:
- Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' items usin' clay.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' items usin' clay.
cooking:
- Influences quality and success rate o' cookin' items (via craftin').
 - Influences decay o' cooked items.
 - Increases effectiveness o' eatin' cooked food.
 - Increased chance o' successfully preservin' and refinin' cooked items.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when cookin' items.
fishing:
- Increases chance t' successfully catch a fish. Increases maximum range when usin' a fishin' rod.
 - Increases th' chance o' successfully catchin' a fish without bait.
fletching:
- Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' arrows, bows, and slings.
 - Increased chance o' successfully repairin', reinforcin', and refinin' fletched items.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' arrows, bows, and slings.
glassblowing:
- Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' items usin' glass.
 - Increased chance o' successfully reinforcin', and refinin' glass items.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' items usin' glass.
leatherworking:
- Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' items usin' leather.
 - Increased chance o' successfully repairin', reinforcin', and refinin' leather items.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' items usin' leather.
lockpicking:
- Increases chance t' successfully unlock a chest.
 - Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' lockpicks.
 - Increased chance o' successfully repairin', reinforcin', and refinin' lockpicks.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' lockpicks.
lumberjacking:
- Increases chance o' gatherin' resources on trees.
 - Increases th' quality o' resources gathered from trees.
 - Decreases chance o' stamina reduction while lumberjackin'.
 - Increases th' amount o' resources gathered at a time.
mining:
- Increases chance o' gatherin' resources while minin' rock/holystone or diggin'.
 - Decreases chance o' stamina reduction while minin' and diggin'.
 - Increases th' quality o' resources gathered from rock/holystone.
 - Increases th' amount o' resources gathered at a time.
mycology:
- Decreases chance o' tramplin' mushrooms when steppin' on them.
 - Increases chance o' gatherin'/harvested resources on mushrooms.
 - Increases th' quality o' resources gathered/harvested from mushrooms.
 - Decreases chance o' stamina reduction while gatherin'/harvestin' from mushrooms.
 - Decreases chance o' damagin' th' mushrooms when harvestin' or gatherin' from it.
 - Decreases spore germination time.
 - Increases th' amount o' resources gathered/harvested at a time.
 - Increases effectiveness o' eatin' mushroom consumables.
 - Increased chance o' successfully preservin', and refinin' mushrooms.
parrying:
- Increases yer base defense value when holdin' an item in each hand.
 - Increases chance t' take less damage in combat.
 - Decreases chance o' stamina reduction from bein' attacked.
stonecrafting:
- Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' items usin' stones and rocks.
 - Increased chance o' successfully repairin', reinforcin', and refinin' stone items.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' items usin' stones and rocks.
swimming:
- Increases speed in water travel.
 - Decreases chance o' stamina reduction in water.
 - At high skill, allows combatin' th' tides t' travel t' other islands.
tactics:
- Increases yer base attack value.
 - Increases chance t' hit targets in combat.
 - Decreases chance o' stamina reduction while attackin'.
 - Increases damage when usin' throwin' or marksmanship.
tailoring:
- Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' items usin' cloth or fabric.
 - Increased chance o' successfully repairin', reinforcin', and refinin' fabric items.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' items usin' cloth or fabric.
throwing: - Increases attack damage, accuracy, and maximum range when throwin' or slingin' an item.
tinkering:
- Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' items usin' miscellaneous resources and methods.
 - Increased chance o' successfully repairin', reinforcin', and refinin' miscellaneous items.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' items usin' miscellaneous resources.
trapping:
- Increases th' amount o' damage and success rate o' trappin' creatures with traps.
 - Increases th' success rate o' trappin' untamed creatures in cages.
 - Reduces chance o' settin' off traps and reduces damage taken from traps.
woodworking:
- Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' items usin' wood.
 - Increased chance o' successfully repairin', reinforcin', and refinin' wooden items.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' items usin' wood.
taming:
- Increases chance o' successfully tamin' a creature.
 - Increases length o' time creature will be tamed fer.
 - Decreases chance o' stamina reduction when tamin'/offerin'/milkin'/hitchin'/pettin'.
 - Decreases amount o' happiness reduced when milkin' goats.
 - Increases chance o' tamin' when offerin' a bilge-suckin' creature items.
 - Increased chance o' hitchin' bilge-suckin' or untamed creatures.
 - Increases effectiveness o' pettin' creatures t' increase happiness and other bonus effects.
 - Adds ability t' detect additional information about tamed creatures.
 - As skill increases, more creature commands become available.
horticulture:
- Increases th' durability (or health) o' sown plants or mushrooms.
 - Decreases growth time when waterin' plants or mushrooms.
 - Increases chance o' successfully tillin'.
 - Decreases chance o' stamina reduction while tillin'.
 - Influences quality and success rate o' craftin' items requirin' horticulture skill.
 - Increased chance o' successfully refinin' items requirin' horticulture skill.
 - Adds ability t' detect crafted quality chances, mastercraft chances, and craftin' efficacy with increasin' accuracy when craftin' items requirin' horticulture skill.
bartering: - Influences th' amount o' barter credit received or used when tradin' items.
seafaring:
- Allows travelin' t' further islands in a single trip.
 - Reduces th' stamina cost o' encumbrance while paddlin'.
 - Reduces th' time it takes t' travel between islands, tharby reducin' th' hunger and thirst gained on th' voyage, th' damage dealt t' th' boat, and th' amount that items decay.
thaumaturgy:
- Increased chance o' successfully transmogrifyin', enchantin', enhancin', upgradin', and alterin' items.
 - Decreases chance o' stamina reduction while transmogrifyin'/enchantin'/enhancin'/upgradin'/alterin' items.
dualWielding:
- Increases additional damage from wieldin' a second weapon in yer off hand.
 - Decreases chance o' extra stamina reduction while dual wieldin'.
theurgy:
- Improves th' results o' invokin' some rune types.
 - Decreases th' time required before a deity can be invoked again.
 - Increases chance o' receivin' runes from deities.

health:
Yer physical wellbein'.
- Yer health fallin' t' zero will spell yer demise.
- Many negative statuses can directly impact yer health, but {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:each o' them can be cured}.
stamina:
Th' energy ye have t' perform actions.
- Nearin' zero {#--COLOR-WARNING:{$STATUS:EXHAUSTED:tires}} ye, slowin' yer movement.
- Reachin' zero {#--COLOR-BAD:{$STATUS:EXHAUSTED:exhausts}} ye. Performin' actions while exhausted strains yer body and deals {$STAT:HEALTH:damage}!
- Stamina can be recovered over time, by restin', or with some consumable items.
hunger:
Yer desperation fer food.
- Many items can be eaten, but {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:only some be entirely safe}. Testin' foods reveals their effects on yer stats.
- Reachin' negative values begins {#--COLOR-BAD:{$STATUS:STARVIn':starvation}}, dealin' equivalent {$STAT:HEALTH:damage}!
thirst:
Yer desperation fer water.
- Salt water can be safely consumed if distilled.
- Fresh water can always be consumed, but {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:may contain harmful miasma if not purified}.
- Reachin' negative values begins {#--COLOR-BAD:{$STATUS:DEHYDRATED:dehydration}}, dealin' equivalent {$STAT:HEALTH:damage}!
weight:
Th' burden ye carry.
- Nearin' yer weight limit {#--COLOR-WARNING:{$STATUS:ENCUMBERED:encumbers}} ye, and increases yer {$STAT:THIRST} rate.
- Exceedin' yer weight limit {#--COLOR-BAD:{$STATUS:ENCUMBERED:overburdens}} ye, each movement drainin' yer {$STAT:STAMINA}.
attack:
Th' damage ye will deal t' yer opponents.
- Damage be equal t' yer {$SKILL:TACTICS} + yer {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:weapon's attack value} + some godforsaken {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:vulnerabilities} \- some godforsaken {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:resistances}.
- More damage types on a weapon means it fills a more niche role, as it be more likely that creatures will resist, be immune from, or even regenerate from that damage.
- Creatures' vulnerabilities and resistances can be discovered by usin' various damage types against them.
defense:
Yer protection from opponents and th' elements.
- Damage dealt t' ye be equal t' th' {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:enemy's attack} \- yer {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:base defense} \- yer {$SKILL:PARRYING} skill (with equipment in both hands) + some godforsaken {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:vulnerabilities} \- some godforsaken {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:resistances}.
metabolism:
Yer body's efficiency; extendin' th' time before hunger and thirst take hold.
- Increases time before {$STAT:THIRST:dehydration} and {$STAT:HUNGER:starvation}.
strength:
Th' raw muscle t' endure punishment and carry heavy burdens with ease.
- Increases maximum {$STAT:HEALTH} and {$STAT:WEIGHT:carry weight}.
curse:
As night be struck, strange things begin t' occur...
- Yer curse be determined by yer hold over th' island.
- Durin' th' night, thar may be one or more curse events. Th' greater yer curse, th' greater th' chance o' these events.
- {#--TEXT-PRIMARY:Sleepin' prevents curse events.}
- As dawn breaks, some godforsaken strangeness from events will fade.
dexterity:
Swift precision o' movements t' maximize yer endurance.
- Increases maximum {$STAT:STAMINA}

poisoned: Ye feel nauseous as ye writhe in pain.
burned: Yer skin be raw and inflamed.
encumbered: Ye be carryin' too much weight.
starving: Ye feel empty and lethargic as yer body begins t' consume itself.
dehydrated: Yer throat be parched, yer mouth be dry, and yer head aches.
overheating: Th' temperature be too warm; yer skin be sticky with sweat and yer throat be quick t' parch.
freezing: Th' temperature be too cold; yer extremities be goin' numb as yer body struggles t' stay warm.
frostbitten: Ye feel th' sharp, cold pain o' frozen extremities.
frenzied: Its hostility be swift and relentless!

dynamic: Attempt t' dynamically position th' keyboard based on whar th' input be located on screen.
top: Always position th' keyboard alon' th' top o' th' screen.
bottom: Always position th' keyboard alon' th' bottom o' th' screen.

fire: A dangerous open flame providin' heat and light.
honeyFungus: A parasitic tree fungus that can grow and spread on livin', decayin', and dead plant material.
tumblingTumbleweed: A dry and brittle tumblin' weed, broken off from its roots and spreadin' seeds in its meanderin' path.
animalDroppings: Droppings produced by a small mammal.
birdDroppings: Droppings produced by some winged creature.
animalDung: A seemingly fresh pile o' feces, excreted from an animal.
guano: Th' excrement o' a bat, thought t' be used as fertilizer.
wispDust: A smartly vanishin' pile o' glowin' dust, excreted from a ghastly wisp.
acid: A neon-green ooze; boilin' and bubblin' into th' ground.

ui.menuCustomGameOptionsEternalNightDescrip: Th' moon will ne'er set; th' sun will ne'er rise.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsEternalDayDescripti: Th' sun will ne'er set; th' moon will ne'er rise.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsTimeDayLengthToolti: Th' number o' turns/ticks in a day.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsTimeDayPercentToolt: A number representin' how much o' th' day be "daytime" and, inversely, how much o' th' day be {/not/} "night time".
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsStatusPassChanceMul: When {0}, scales th' chance o' th' negative effect passin'.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsStatusUntreatableTo: Whether this status effect be untreatable - if checked, th' effect must pass naturally.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsSkillInitialRandomC: Th' random startin' skills may be overwritten by custom startin' skills.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsSkillMultiplierTool: Scales th' rate at which this skill be gained.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsRandomItemsDescript: If disabled, players will spawn in th' world without startin' items.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsItemDecayTooltip: Scales item decay (for example, how lon' food lasts) globally.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsViewGroundItemsAsCo: Allows viewin' a dialog fer interactin' with items on th' ground, as if they were in a real container.
ui.menuNewsDescription: Come across information pertainin' t' th' game and its updates.
ui.menuOptionsButtonHealthVignetteTooltip: If checked, th' red vignettin' effect displayed when at low health will not be shown.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisplayArticleInObjectN: By default, object names include an article. Fer instance, "A Branch" or "A Bilge-suckin' Wolf". Disablin' this option removes th' article, resultin' in "Branch" and "Bilge-suckin' Wolf".
ui.menuOptionsButtonSaveDataBackupsTooltip: Backs up th' last 5 saves t' th' backup folder.
ui.menuOptionsButtonTracingRecordingTooltip:
Records performance trace files t' th' logs folder. Useful fer debuggin' performance issues.
Note: These files can get very large very fast. Try not t' record fer too lon'.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDropLocationFeetWhenFac: Drop Items at Feet When Facin' Tile be Blocked
ui.menuOptionsHeadingGameplayOptionsDescrip: These settings be located in th' Gameplay Settings dialog fer easy access.
ui.menuOptionsTooltipTurnDelay: Th' amount o' movement delay that occurs after switchin' a direction or turnin'.
ui.menuOptionsTooltipMouseTurnDelay: Th' amount o' movement delay that occurs after switchin' a direction or turnin' when usin' yer mouse.
ui.menuOptionsTooltipControlsFilter: Filter th' game's bindable actions. Ye can do multiple selections at once with a comma {#--TEXT-SECONDARY:({#--COLOR-BIND:,})} and invert a selection by prefixin' it with an exclamation point {#--TEXT-SECONDARY:({#--COLOR-BIND:!})}
ui.menuOptionsBindChoose: Press anythin' t' choose th' replacement bindin'.
ui.menuOptionsBindChooseAdd: Press anythin' t' choose an additional bindin'.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDiscoverEverythingDescr: Much o' Wayward's gameplay be about experimentation, exploration, and discovery. As such, many details, and even some UI components and options be hidden until you've "discovered" them. This option allows disablin' this discovery system  though be warned, seein' everythin' can be overwhelmin', and also take some o' th' fun out o' th' game!
ui.menuOptionsButtonGrantAllMilestoneModifi: Wayward's achievement system, "Milestones", comes with "modifiers" that can be added t' subsequent saves, grantin' bonuses or spicin' up gameplay. This option allows ye t' apply those modifiers t' a game without first completin' th' milestone.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAllowAlternatingDirecti: If checked, ye will move in alternatin' directions when two directions be pressed or diagonal angles be used with th' mouse.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAlwaysShowMoreInformati: If checked, ye will ne'er have t' hold down a key t' show more information in tooltips.
ui.menuOptionsButtonEnableLowPowerModeToolt: If checked, th' game will try t' use less system resources.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisableAcrylicTranspare: If checked, transparent elements  such as tooltips, dialogs, and interrupt screens  will no longer blur what's under them, possibly reducin' GPU and CPU load on some devices.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisableOverlaySupportTo: If checked, overlay support will be disabled which will reduce GPU load, but will belay external program overlays and th' Steam Overlay from functionin' properly.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisableUIEffectsTooltip: If checked, animations and other effects on th' UI will be disabled, possibly reducin' GPU and CPU load on some devices.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisableUIOpacityTooltip: If checked, opacity (transparency) will be disabled on UI elements, possibly reducin' GPU and CPU load on some devices.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisableMovementAnimatio: If checked, movement animations will be disabled, possibly reducin' GPU and CPU load on some devices.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAutoAttackTooltip: If checked, ye will automatically attack when movin' into a creature or player (with PVP enabled) with whichever hand(s) ye have selected.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAutoPickUpTooltip: If checked, ye will automatically loot items as ye move on top o' them.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAutoPickUpOnIdleTooltip: If checked, ye will automatically loot items under yer character when ye idle.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDropOnDismantleTooltip: If checked, ye will automatically drop items under yer character when dismantlin' items.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDropOnDisassembleToolti: If checked, ye will automatically drop items under yer character when disassemblin' items.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisableCraftingProtecte: Disable Craftin' with Protected Required Items
If checked, protected required items will not be used in craftin' at all. Consumed protected items will ne'er be used in crafts regardless o' what this option be set to.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDropOnGatherHarvestTool: If checked, ye will automatically drop items under yer character as ye chop/mine/harvest/dig them.
ui.menuOptionsButtonUseAdjacentContainersTo: If checked, items in adjacent containers or tiles can be used in craftin' and other actions.
ui.menuOptionsButtonHideEquippedHeadgearToo: If checked, equipped headgear on yer character will not be visible t' ye.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisableItemNotifiersToo: If checked, item notifiers will not be displayed overhead when items be damaged, looted, moved, etc.
ui.menuOptionsButtonLeftHandedTooltip: If checked, yer main hand slot will display on yer character's port hand.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDropIntoContainersToolt: If checked, when facin' a container, items will be dropped into th' container instead o' onto th' ground.
ui.menuOptionsButtonWarnOnDangerousActionsT: If checked, a confirmation screen will display when craftin', gatherin', or restin' with items that be on fire and could burn ye.
ui.menuOptionsButtonWarnOnDestructiveAction: If checked, a confirmation screen will display when attemptin' t' gather plants that will not produce some godforsaken resources yet.
ui.menuOptionsButtonWarnWhenBreakingItemsOn: If checked, a confirmation screen will display when tryin' t' craft/dismantle usin' items that will break on use or failure.
If checked, a confirmation screen will display when tryin' t' use damaged items that may break on use.
ui.menuOptionsTooltipDialogOpacity: Controls how opaque th' in-game dialogs be.
ui.menuOptionsDeveloperUIExperimentsDescrip: New work-in-progress UI functionality. Use at yer own risk  these experimentations may cause catastrophic errors! Only enable these if ye know what yer doin'.
ui.menuOptionsButtonSaveCompressionTooltip: Reduces th' size o' saves by up t' 80%, at th' cost o' longer save and load times. Useful when space be limited.
ui.menuOptionsButtonSaveUIDataGlobally: Remember UI State fer New Saves
ui.menuOptionsButtonSaveUIDataGloballyToolt: Enablin' this allows newly created saves t' re-use yer previous games UI state (element/dialog positions) instead o' th' default state.
ui.menuPauseTooltipNotPaused: In multiplayer, th' game does not pause unless th' host has paused it.
ui.menuModesDescription: Configure game options associated with this save.
ui.menuMultiplayerOptionsOpenServerDescript: Allow players t' join yer game.
ui.menuMultiplayerOptionsCopyGameCodeToolti: Copy th' game code t' yer clipboard. Share it with yer friends t' play together!
ui.menuMultiplayerOptionsCheckConnectionPar: Check if yer network be configured properly. Visit th' {(https://www.waywardgame.com/multiplayer):multiplayer page} on th' Wayward website fer more information. Only one o' th' followin' need t' show as {#--COLOR-GOOD:green} fer multiplayer t' work.
ui.menuMultiplayerOptionsCheckConnectionRes: {#--COLOR-BAD:Unable t' verify connection t' th' Steam Relay Network}.
{#--COLOR-BAD:Th' Steam Relay Network be not available}.
ui.menuJoinServerInputPlaceholder: Game Code, IP Address, or Hostname
ui.menuJoinServerChooseModifiersDescription: Enable and disable benefits and challenges.
ui.menuSharedMultiplayerChoiceLobbyTypeFrie: Anyone may be invited t' th' server, and th' game will be visible and joinable t' yer friends.
ui.menuSharedMultiplayerChoiceLobbyTypePubl: Th' game will be visible and joinable fer anyone.
ui.menuSharedMultiplayerChoiceLobbyTypePriv: Th' only way fer players t' join th' game be t' be invited.
ui.menuSharedMultiplayerChoicePVPDescriptio: Allow players t' attack each other.
ui.menuSharedMultiplayerChoiceAllowTravelin: Allow players t' travel t' other islands.
ui.menuSharedMultiplayerChoiceAllowHardcore: Allow players t' respawn in "Hardcore Mode" as a new character when they die.
ui.menuSharedMultiplayerChoicePauseOnDesync: Pauses th' game when a multiplayer client be disconnected due t' a desync.
ui.menuSharedRealTimeTickSpeedTooltip: Th' time it takes fer a tick t' occur in real-time mode.
ui.menuSharedMilestonesNotUnlockableDescrip:
{#--TEXT-SECONDARY:{0?Milestones be not unlockable in {#--TEXT-COLOR:{1}} mode.}{2?{0?
}Mods be enabled that prevent milestone unlockin'\: {2}}}
ui.miscBindingIconThen: This arrow symbol means this bindin' be a sequence o' inputs. Ye can read it as "then"

dropAll: Drop all o' this kind o' item on th' ground in front o' ye, or below ye, or into a container (dependin' on th' context and/or settings).
dropAllOfSameQuality: Drop all o' this kind o' item, o' this quality, on th' ground in front o' ye, or below ye, or into a container (dependin' on th' context and/or settings).
move: Move th' item t' an open container dialog.
moveAll: Move all o' this kind o' item, t' an open container dialog.
moveAllOfSameQuality: Move all o' this kind o' item, o' this quality, t' an open container dialog.
itemActions: Perform an item action usin' th' "best" applicable item.
commandFollowClose: Command a tamed creature t' follow at th' default distance.
commandFollowFar: Command a tamed creature t' follow further back than normal.
commandStay: Command a tamed creature t' stay at this exact location.
commandDefend: Command a tamed creature t' defend this area.
commandAttack: Command a tamed creature t' attack everythin' in this area.
commandHeel: Command a tamed creature t' heel, always followin' ye and ne'er attackin'.
moveContentsToInventory: Move th' contents o' this container t' yer duffle.
moveContentsToActiveContainer: Move th' contents o' this container t' th' active container.
moveContentsToFacingContainer: Move th' contents o' this container t' th' container ye be facin'.
commandAllFollowClose: Command tamed creatures t' follow at th' default distance.
commandAllFollowFar: Command tamed creatures t' follow further back than normal.
commandAllStay: Command tamed creatures t' stay at this exact location.
commandAllDefend: Command tamed creatures t' defend this area.
commandAllAttack: Command tamed creatures t' attack everythin' in this area.
commandAllHeel: Command tamed creatures t' heel, always followin' ye and ne'er attackin'.
ascend: Climb th' passageway t' return t' th' surface.
descend: Venture down th' passageway into th' caves below.
